Bosse_Erichthonios_Status_Cold Spell_Des: Overwhelmed by the power of ice.
Bosse_Erichthonios_Status_Hot Spell_Desc: Overwhelmed by the power of fire.
Bosse_Unknown Source_Status_Cold Spell_D: Overwhelmed by the power of ice.
Bosse_Unknown Source_Status_Hot Spell_De: Overwhelmed by the power of fire.
ContentDesc_Asphodelos - Erster Kreis: The discovery of a crystal borne from the far reaches of the aetherial sea and the desperate plea contained within lead you once more to Elpis, where your trajectory quite literally collides with that of a young man named Themis. Like you, he is here for answers, seeking the source of an aetheric disturbance culminating in loss of contact with the gaol housing the ancients' most dangerous creations. It is this place─this Pandæmonium─into which you now descend...
instancecontenttextdata_ids_32101_Text: I must save them... But first...
instancecontenttextdata_ids_32104_Text: Be assailed by ice and flame!
instancecontenttextdata_ids_32105_Text: Your bones to ash! Your flesh to ice!
instancecontenttextdata_ids_32107_Text: I cannot allow you to run free!
instancecontenttextdata_ids_32109_Text: No... The lives of my colleagues are at stake!
instancecontenttextdata_ids_32110_Text: Should it cost me my life, I will triumph!
instancecontenttextdata_ids_32116_Text: Run all you like, but my chains will catch you!
instancecontenttextdata_ids_32117_Text: Drag them unto the depths, O chains!
instancecontenttextdata_ids_32118_Text: I will lock you away, once and again! Forever!
